title: Being a Daughter
content:
First of all, I would like to congratulate all the boys out there who gave pleasant happiness to their parents, the day they were born and all the patience in the world to deal with their tantrums life-long.

title: Tips to get your parents to accept your love marriage.
content: If you are also one of those young Indians grappling with questions like "Why Indian parents are against love marriage?" or "How to convince parents for love marriage?" , need not worry.
